name: aberdeen
description: A TypeScript/JavaScript library for quickly building performant declarative user interfaces without the use of a virtual DOM nor any transpilation.

scripts.build-dist: rm -rf dist dist-min && tsc && mkdir -p dist-min && cp dist/*.d.ts dist-min && for f in dist/*.js ; do terser $f --module --compress --mangle --mangle-props 'regex=/^_/' --source-map "content='$f.map',base='dist-min/',url='$(basename $f).map'" --output dist-min/$(basename $f); done && chmod a-w dist/* dist-min/*
scripts.coverage: $npm_execpath run build-dist && NODE_OPTIONS=--enable-source-maps c8 --all -n dist-min -r html -r text mocha --file tests/_init.js tests/[^_]*.js
scripts.test: $npm_execpath run build-dist && NODE_OPTIONS=--enable-source-maps mocha --file tests/_init.js tests/[^_]*.js

author: Frank van Viegen
